name: Every day Bug
description:
This short puzzle game is a free narrative of what happened around the first bug in the history of the computer.

Accompany Grace Hopper to find the cause of her problems.


Why doesn't the computer work as expected?

And even stranger - why are the solutions not sustainable?

Solve puzzles to get the computer back to work.

Repair different parts of the computer.

But why are they damaged at all?

And eventually find out what happens during the night.

Made for the Wowie! Jam 2.0. The topic was: intentional bugs.
Made with the RPGMaker MV.

Controls


ActionEnterNavigationArrows
